Major_Arcs.title: Introduction of Human Meteor and Initial Investigation
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the main character, Human Meteor/Duke O'Dowd, and sets up the initial mystery involving suspicious characters and a chase.

sub_scenes.title: Underwater Introduction
sub_scenes.description: Introduces the comic title, the Human Meteor, and the initial underwater setting, hinting at a coming story.

sub_scenes.title: Taxi Ride and Suspicious Car Chase
sub_scenes.description: Duke, as a taxi driver, encounters suspicious wealthy men and then witnesses a suspicious car chase, leading him to transform into Human Meteor.

narrative_arcs.title: Duke's Taxi Ride to the Waterfront

sub_scenes.title: Confrontation and Aftermath
sub_scenes.description: Human Meteor confronts the suspects, leading to a fight and subsequent recovery in a hospital, setting up the next phase of the investigation.

Major_Arcs.title: Yacht and Submarine Espionage
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shifts the focus to a yacht and an underwater submarine plot, involving Toby's infiltration and the discovery of a Japanese submarine.

sub_scenes.title: Stowaway Plan and Yacht Infiltration
sub_scenes.description: Duke and Toby devise a plan for Toby to infiltrate the yacht, leading to Toby successfully boarding but getting discovered.

sub_scenes.title: Yacht Deception and Cabin Trap
sub_scenes.description: The 'playboys' are seen working on the yacht, and one is trapped after finding a depth chart, revealing a dangerous situation on the yacht.

narrative_arcs.title: Yacht Deck Work and Cabin Trap

sub_scenes.title: Duke's Deduction and Toby's Betrayal
sub_scenes.description: Duke realizes he's been set up, while Toby is revealed to be working with the 'Captain', not a victim, indicating a deeper conspiracy.

narrative_arcs.title: Submarine Plot and Toby's True Role

sub_scenes.title: Underwater Reconnaissance and Submarine Plot Reveal
sub_scenes.description: Human Meteor investigates underwater, discovers a sunken Japanese submarine, and deduces a torpedo replenishment plot.

sub_scenes.title: Underwater Conflict and Submarine Attack
sub_scenes.description: Human Meteor confronts divers, leading to a fight, while a submarine on the surface reacts to the underwater events and attempts to escape, culminating in Human Meteor attacking the ship.

narrative_arcs.title: Divers' Initial Encounter with Human Meteor
Human Meteor's Intervention and Divers' Hostility
Human Meteor's Threat and Divers' Retaliation
Discovery of Peter's Condition on Ship
Namor's Determined Final Attack and Ship Crew's Fear

Major_Arcs.title: Yacht Resolution and Hospital Visit
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on Duke's boat chase to the yacht, confrontation with Peter/Holden, and the resolution of the yacht subplot, followed by a hospital visit.

sub_scenes.title: Yacht Boat Chase and Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: Duke, in a boat chase, reaches the yacht and confronts Peter, who is surprisingly alive, leading to investigation of Peter's cabin.

narrative_arcs.title: Search for the Depth Map in Peter's Cabin
Exposing Peter's Treachery to the Officer

sub_scenes.title: Hospital Visit and Day's End
sub_scenes.description: Duke visits Holden in the hospital, followed by a reflection on the day's events and Toby returning home, concluding this phase of the story.

narrative_arcs.title: Evening Reflection after a Chaotic Day
Toby's Home and Invitation to Visit Holden

Major_Arcs.title: Liberty Lads and Bus Garage Conspiracy
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shifts to a new storyline involving Liberty Lads, a mysterious ambulance, and a conspiracy at a bus garage, uncovering Nazi spies.

sub_scenes.title: Liberty Lads Action and Ambulance Arrival
sub_scenes.description: Introduces Liberty Lads in action, followed by a shift to a suburban scene with an ambulance arriving, setting up a new mystery.

narrative_arcs.title: Liberty Lads in Action Against Nazis

sub_scenes.title: Bus Garage Clues and Marine Encounter
sub_scenes.description: Boys find a wallet leading them to a bus garage, where they observe a Marine saluting a civilian, raising suspicions.

narrative_arcs.title: The Dropped Wallet and the Bus Garage Address
Marine Salutes a Civilian - Major Bronson

sub_scenes.title: Bus Garage Confrontation and Abduction
sub_scenes.description: Boys arrive at the bus garage and are confronted by police, leading to their abduction by Mr. Horst.

sub_scenes.title: Interrogation and Office Chaos
sub_scenes.description: Boys are interrogated by Mr. Horst, overhearing a sinister plan, and then a fight breaks out as Major Bronson arrives.

sub_scenes.title: Escape, Sabotage Plans, and Marine Intervention
sub_scenes.description: Boys escape, discover sabotage plans, and Marines respond to the alert, engaging in combat.

narrative_arcs.title: Discovery of Sabotage Plans in Secret Office
Resolution and Victory Over Nazi Spies

Major_Arcs.title: The Twinkle Twins and South American Intrigue
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the Twinkle Twins and their adventure in South America, involving kidnapping, bandits, and a rescue mission.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction of Twinkle Twins and South American Setting
sub_scenes.description: Introduces the Twinkle Twins and sets the scene in South America, with soldiers searching for 'Americans'.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction of The Champ and Henry and the Nazi Threat
Setting the Scene in South America and the Soldiers' Search
Confrontation and Fight in the Desert

sub_scenes.title: Soldier Interrogation and Escape Plan
sub_scenes.description: Soldiers interrogate civilians, and Champ and Henry decide to escape and seek help from the American Consul.

narrative_arcs.title: Escape and the Decision to Seek the American Consul
Explanation of Suspicion: Rosita's Kidnapping and El Tigre

sub_scenes.title: Forced Car Ride and Misunderstanding
sub_scenes.description: Champ and Henry are forced into a car by El Tigre, leading to a house where a woman mistakenly believes they have rescued her daughter Rosita.

narrative_arcs.title: Forced Entry into Car and Commanded Drive
Suspicious Car Ride and Destination Order

sub_scenes.title: El Tigre Infiltration and Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: Plans are made to confront El Tigre, leading to infiltration of his hideout and a direct confrontation.

narrative_arcs.title: Preparation for Action on Tamale Street
Infiltration of El Tigre's Hideout with Stage Dollars

sub_scenes.title: Garbage Bin Interrogation and Rosita Search
sub_scenes.description: A confrontation leads to a man being thrown in a garbage bin and interrogated about Rosita's location, revealing a personal motive.

narrative_arcs.title: Searching for Rosita and Threatening El Tigre

sub_scenes.title: Accusation, Rescue News, and Horseback Pursuit
sub_scenes.description: Accusations are made, news of Rosita's imprisonment arrives, leading to a horseback pursuit for her rescue.

narrative_arcs.title: Ride to Headquarters and Rescue Resolve
Citadel Escape and Rear Entrance Strategy
Machine Gun Deployment and Rosita's Intervention

Major_Arcs.title: Devil Dog Dolan in the Jungle
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on Devil Dog Dolan's jungle combat, disobedience, and capture, revealing a sub detector plan plot.

sub_scenes.title: Jungle Combat and Reporting
sub_scenes.description: Devil Dog Dolan engages in jungle combat and then reports to a superior officer, hinting at a grave matter.

narrative_arcs.title: Jungle Combat with Devil Dog Dolan

sub_scenes.title: Disobedience Justification and Planned Action
sub_scenes.description: Dolan justifies his disobedience due to his son's danger and sub detector plans, and other soldiers plan action in response.

sub_scenes.title: Jungle Arrival and Ambush
sub_scenes.description: Dolan arrives in the jungle, explores alone, and is ambushed by native warriors.

sub_scenes.title: Capture, Torture, and Plan Acquisition
sub_scenes.description: Dolan or a soldier is rescued, suspicion arises, orders are given for plans, leading to torture and forced handover of sub detector plans.

narrative_arcs.title: Note Writing and Plan Negotiation under Duress
Devil Dog's Recovery and Plan Acquisition

sub_scenes.title: Arson, Marine Attack, and Dolan's Capture
sub_scenes.description: Dolan commits arson, Marines launch an attack, Sam acts bravely in the fire, and Dolan is ultimately captured.

narrative_arcs.title: Native Huts Ablaze Amidst Marine Assault

sub_scenes.title: Jungle Fight and Native Alliance
sub_scenes.description: Dolan fights natives, the Chief dies unexpectedly, leading to native homage and a new alliance with Grauer.

narrative_arcs.title: Dolan's Jungle Entrance and Initial Encounter
Fight with Natives and Chief's Demise
Grauer's Dialogue with Native and Alliance

sub_scenes.title: Captain's Surrender and Dolan's Discipline
sub_scenes.description: Captain contemplates surrender due to Grauer, officers fight attackers to protect Sam, and Dolan receives discipline but is recognized for his service.

narrative_arcs.title: Shore Leave Rescinded and Dolan's Discipline

Major_Arcs.title: The Twinkle Twins and the Burgess Murder Mystery
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the Twinkle Twins and their investigation into the murder of Robert Burgess, focusing on clues, hospital visits, and the eventual arrest of the real culprit.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction of Twinkle Twins and Murder Briefing
sub_scenes.description: Introduces the Twinkle Twins and their modus operandi, and they are briefed on the Robert Burgess murder case.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction to the Twinkle Twins Story
Newspaper Office Briefing on Burgess Murder

sub_scenes.title: Police Station and Hospital Investigation
sub_scenes.description: Twinkle Twins visit the police station and then the hospital, discovering Tom Reilly's illness and vulnerability.

narrative_arcs.title: Police Station Inquiry about Reilly's Skip

sub_scenes.title: Blood Revelation and Farnacci Link
sub_scenes.description: Doctor reveals Reilly needs a specific blood type, linking to Farnacci, and Twinkle Twins decide to investigate Farnacci further.

narrative_arcs.title: Candy Store Phone Call to Elijah about Farnacci
Decision to Locate Tom Reilly in Irish Section

sub_scenes.title: Irish Section Search and Mrs. Murphy's Revelation
sub_scenes.description: Twinkle Twins search for Reilly in the Irish section and learn from Mrs. Murphy about Reilly's sacrifice and Farnacci's motive.

narrative_arcs.title: Searching for Tom Reilly in the Irish Section
Mrs. Murphy's Revelation about Reilly and Farnacci

sub_scenes.title: Farnacci's Mob Threat and Reilly's Escape
sub_scenes.description: Farnacci's mob plans to eliminate Reilly, while Reilly arrives at Mrs. Murphy's and escapes, initiating a chase.

narrative_arcs.title: Reilly's Coal Chute Escape and Diane's Pursuit
Ambulance Transport and Concern for Victims
Failed Blood Donation Match and Community Appeal
Urgent Call for Blood and Community Response
Decision to Arrest Farnacci and Police Action
Police Raid on Poolroom and Arrest
